profile.description: I am a Backend Developer with experience in working with various programming and web development languages. My ability to adapt quickly to new technologies and environments has allowed me to face challenges effectively. I consider myself a proactive, curious and oriented person to continuous improvement. My focus is on identifying obstacles and finding the best ways to overcome them. In addition, I value team collaboration and knowledge sharing with other professionals.

experience.first-job-description: I used document management software and databases to process and organize documentation efficiently. Presentation of ideas to improve software performance and efficiency
experience.second-job-description: Processing and entry of data in Databases. Training and supervision of new team members. Innovative ideas improved efficiency: I identified opportunities for improvement and proposed solutions that raised team performance. I achieved short and long term goals. C.R.M. management for customer relations. Report analysis drove strategic decisions.
experience.last-job-description: Account prospecting. Assistance in creating ads. Coaching
